name: ZikiPlugin
author: Nicolas Hennion

sections.description:
This plugin aims at displaying the Ziki profile (“http://www.ziki.com”) in a sidebar widget.
You can display:
– avatar
– ziki link
– Ziki profile name
– Real name
– Baseline
– Profile links (technorati, facebook, linkedin…)
– Fans and friends number
– Feedburner and technorati stats
– Display last Twitter baseline

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example

License

Distributed under the Creative Common license
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload zikiplugin.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Actve the widget in the ‘Presentation/Widgets’ menu

short_description: A simple plugin (widget) to display Ziki informations
